review_text: Tish is better but it is small size (228 L)

Received the product  without any damage. Delivery guys were very patient in transporting my refrigerator. Voltas itself is a big brand, so I had no doubt in buying this product. The best part was the installation guy came from 45kms after I again raised complain for installation. That's how the brand will grow and gain the trust of their customers. I will pur my review after 5 to 6 months of usage.
